Chinese.name: Ckafka EB连接器数据转储存到ElasticSearch
Chinese.description: 本示例会将Ckafka EB连接器的消息转存到ElasticSearch中。
Chinese.attention: 在使用本示例代码时需要传递相关的环境变量给函数。

English.name: eb_ckafka_target_to_elasticsearch
English.description: This example consumes eb data and push these data to ElasticSearch.
English.attention: When using this sample code, you need to pass some env variables to this function.
